---
title: "Geodiversity Data Products"
---

Available geophysical remote sensing products from NASA, with their spatial and temporal scales. 


```{r, warning=F, message=F, echo=F}
library(googlesheets)
library(dplyr)
library(DT)
library(htmlwidgets)
library(widgetframe)

ds=gs_key("11cFdkQNeevHMnJ2HxqbxoD3HBEZfXY31mdF9psZmw2k")
d=gs_read_listfeed(ds,ws="FINAL", verbose=FALSE)

d2=d%>%
  slice(-c(1:3))%>%
          mutate(
            Acronym=as.factor(Acronym),
            link=paste("<a href=",Link,"><img src=assets/external-link.png</img></a>"))%>%
    select(
      -one_of(c("Spatial Resolution","Temporal Notes","Data Link","Link","Lithosphere")),
      -starts_with("X"),
      -contains("date start"),
      -contains("date stop"))

d2%>%datatable(
  filter = 'top', 
  escape = F,
  options = list(
    pageLength = 50, autoWidth = TRUE
  ),
  class = 'cell-border stripe',
  caption = ''
  )%>%
  frameWidget(height =500)
```
